### Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
actdat <- read.csv("activity.csv", na.strings = "NA", colClasses = c("numeric","Date", "numeric"))
str(actdat)
```

### What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

1- total number of steps taken per day
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
actstepsum <- aggregate(x=actdat[c("steps")], FUN = sum, by = list(Group.date=actdat$date))
ggplot(actstepsum, aes(x=Group.date, y=steps))+geom_bar(stat="identity")
```
